0.1.1.name: connect20/Atlas_OutofStockSubscription
0.1.1.description:
This extension sends notification to subscribed customers / guests when  product is back in stock and hence they can purchase the product.
Also an email is send to admin once they have subscribed for a particular product.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
